Description: A real rocket queen,... I mean closet queen. The 2010 Gibson USA Les Paul Slash Appetite for Destruction. Limited run of 600. 100% stock with all original parts as she was born from the factory. No breaks, no repairs, no issues. Comes with original case. All case candy is there including the original shipping invoice. Bought as a quasi-collector and fan of Slash/GNR and it is in very good condition. For me it is impossible to own a guitar like this and not play it and have it out on occasion over the years. However, she was always treated like a lady and she was never allowed out of the studio. The cosmetic condition is near perfect with only around 4 very tiny dings in the topcoat only. These are located to the right of the neck pickup at the base of the cutaway horn - I tried to photograph them but they are very small. Back has some very light swirl only nothing even close to deep. Frets are perfect. You will be hard pressed to find a better example. The case has a couple scuffs. Please inquire for additional photos or information. This guitar is the real deal but will not make you play like Slash or bring back 1987. If you have less than ten (10) feedback or any neutral or negative feedback in the last 12 months contact me first or your bid will be cancelled. Ships to lower 48.
Title: 2010 Gibson USA Les Paul Slash AFD Appetite for Destruction
